pkgmetadata.longdescription: Joint Peak Detection in Several ChIP-Seq Samples // Jointly segment several ChIP-seq samples to find the peaks which are the same and different across samples. The fast approximate maximum Poisson likelihood algorithm is described in "PeakSegJoint: fast supervised peak detection via joint segmentation of multiple count data samples" arXiv:1506.01286 by TD Hocking and G Bourque.
